ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Input on Recent digest Topics
ygData.msgSnippet: I can t wait until I m high enough...with my water song, the dungeon I m waiting I m in range to do is Kedge Keep.  Supposedly empty and good xp...just sounds
ygData.messageBody:
I can't wait until I'm high enough...with my water song, the dungeon I'm
waiting I'm in range to do is Kedge Keep. Supposedly empty and good
xp...just sounds too perfect! Besides, I want sharkskin drums. :)
Everyone has MM drums...I wanna be different. Until I can get Selo's drums,
anyway...heh.

Question, though...my group will most likely depend on me to keep breathing.
What should be the actions if I were to go LD? Should they just camp, log
an alt, and wait until I show up? heh...just a thought.

Thanks!
Atonal

Vesheen's Peek

Underbrush
